name: Tic Tac Toe (Noughts and Crosses) - No Ads Free
name_original: Tic Tac Toe (Noughts and Crosses) - No Ads Free
description:
Download the classic Tic Tac Toe paper & pencil game!

Also known as Noughts and Crosses.

Features

*3 difficulty levels.
*Smart artificial intelligence
*Highly customizable. Choose your favourite fonts and colours to create the best Tic Tac Toe game experience for you.
*Light weight and fast application.
